subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors at the trial of the cyclist Tammy Thomas, directed I.R.S. Special Agent Jeff Novitzky to describe his investigative work without identifying any of the athletes implicated for doping.
snippet: Prosecutors at the trial of the cyclist Tammy Thomas, directed I.R.S. Special Agent Jeff Novitzky to describe his investigative work without identifying any of the athletes implicated for doping.
